title: Ep. 627 The Painful Truth About the Clintons
description:
Is Clinton corruption finally catching up with them?

Why is Fusion GPS hiding information? Who paid them and for what?

Now that impeachment is unlikely the desperate Democrats are moving on to this tactic to remove Trump from office. 

This silly Democrat rep is calling for an evaluation of Trump’s mental state.

The Trump tax cuts have this Hillary Clinton bootlicker in a panic. 

There’s a rebellion brewing on the Breitbart board over Steve Bannon.
